item.title: claudia add a quote by Ursula Hegi
item.description: "What the river was showing her now was that she could flow beyond the brokenness, redeem herself, and fuse once more." -- Ursula Hegi

item.title: claudia add a quote by Shel Silverstein
item.description: "How many slams in an old screen door? Depends how loud you shut it. How many slices in a bread? Depends how thin you cut it. How much good inside a day? Depends how good you live 'em. How much love inside a friend? Depends how much you give 'em." -- Shel Silverstein

item.title: claudia add a quote by Pearl S. Buck
item.description: "Many people lose the small joys in the hope for the big happiness." -- Pearl S. Buck

item.title: claudia add a quote by L. Frank Baum
item.description: "You have plenty of courage, I am sure," answered Oz. "All you need is confidence in yourself. There is no living thing that is not afraid when it faces danger. The true courage is in facing danger when you are afraid, and that kind of courage you have in plenty." -- L. Frank Baum
